messages: e553d3594bce34a6dc442a8038a14690 (09:20): 398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40: well, that's exciting. had 240 points. disabled and reenabled cheevos, and now I have 210 points. but everything in the list is the same as it was before disabling...:S
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:21): Asa found a bug earlier that let points double up. the 210 should be the correct number of points
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:21): i've fixed it and it will be in the next update
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:22): but i must say, you have reached the highest point total of all people i've talked to
e553d3594bce34a6dc442a8038a14690 (09:22): (it helps when I looked at the cheat list...)
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:22): there is a link to reset your point total on the about:cheevo page if you wanted to start over

e553d3594bce34a6dc442a8038a14690 (09:24): 398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40: there is an issue where if you have about:cheevos open and you restore the session on startup, the about: handler isn't registered yet (though I think this is a jetpack bug... or at least a jetpack thing to work around...)
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:25): yeah, i don't know how to fix that
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:25): i like using about:cheevos but that is the most annoying part of it
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:25): i think session restore runs before the add-ons are initialized
a011ebac2bc1fe585131de25289be806 (09:26): What is the process for requesting a password reset when you can't log in to https://ldap.mozilla.org/passwordreset/ to reset your password?
e553d3594bce34a6dc442a8038a14690 (09:27): 398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40: here's hoping whatever happens with bug 644595 can work around that somehow :)
a011ebac2bc1fe585131de25289be806 (09:30): I think so too. But, I can't remember what product/component to file it in
a011ebac2bc1fe585131de25289be806 (09:30): I know it is on the intranet
a011ebac2bc1fe585131de25289be806 (09:30): but I can't access it
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:31): To reset the password (if you don't know the original one), log a ticket with the IT helpdesk and we will reset it for you.
a011ebac2bc1fe585131de25289be806 (09:32): 398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40: thanks. I was trying product=itrequest
e553d3594bce34a6dc442a8038a14690 (09:35): heh... Tilt works on chrome://browser/content/browser.xul as well...
398e3848552c55d931d7ae4b48ffea40 (09:36): hehe, nice. the identity block is really deep
